blank_prompt_original: A "valley" is a low area between hills or mountains typically with a river running through it. Answer: "valley".

blank_prompt_original: "A "generation" is a term used to describe all of the people born and living at about the same time. Answer: "generation"."

blank_prompt_original: "The "south" is a cardinal direction opposite to north. Answer: "south"."

blank_prompt_original: A "city" is a large human settlement where people live and work. Answer: "city".

blank_prompt_original: A "language" is used to communicate thoughts and ideas. Answer: "language".

blank_prompt_original: "A "speed" is used to measure how fast something is moving. Answer: "speed"."

blank_prompt_original: "Advance" is a term used to describe moving forward or making progress. Answer: "advance".
